descriptionHtml:
=============
DESCRIPTION
=============
This mod add 2 races to Skyrim.

Ersenimus
Daedra like but without horns , they came to Skyrim from Oblivion.

Here is M/F versions
This Race has unique spell:
Fire Damage

Esmer
They camed from myphs of nord\'s.
Esmer - hybrid of nord and Snow ELf.
They look like nords but they have SNow ELf Tatooes from birth.

Here only F version
This Race has unique spell:
Restore Health

Both Races has CBBE body 

Racial Ability:
2Hweapon - 15
1H weapon - 10
Light Armor - 15
Smiothing - 15
Eloquence - 15

================
INSTALL
================
Copy to Data

================
UNINSTALL
================
Delete
meshes/ersesm
textures/esmer,Ersenimus
author: Den987
